summary: Add CSV export capability to the Pioneers page.

existing_features.title: Add an "Export to CSV" button to the Pioneers page header, positioned in the top-right next to the existing "Add Pioneer" button.

Implement client-side CSV generation and download when the "Export to CSV" button is clicked. The exported CSV must include one row per pioneer and the following columns in this exact order: Pioneer Name, Service Year, Total Hours, Average Hours, Current Status, September Hours, October Hours, November Hours, December Hours, January Hours, February Hours, March Hours, April Hours, May Hours, June Hours, July Hours, August Hours.

Style the new "Export to CSV" button to match the existing "Add Pioneer" button styling on the Pioneers page, but differentiate it using a secondary visual treatment and/or a download icon, while keeping all other UI unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an "Export to CSV" button on the Pioneers page that downloads "pioneers-export.csv" containing all pioneers with specified columns including monthly hours (0/blank when missing), styled similarly to "Add Pioneer" (secondary color and/or download icon).

projectName: Add Export to CSV button on Pioneers page
